articles.title: Video shows former boxer Mike Tyson punching airline passenger - Channel NewsAsia

articles.content: Authorities were investigating on Thursday (Apr 21) after former heavyweight champ Mike Tyson was recorded on video punching a fellow passenger on board a plane at San Francisco International Airport… [+2658 chars]

articles.title: Why Chen Hanwei doesn't think a Will Smith moment will ever happen to him at the Star Awards - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actor is hosting the live Star Awards show on Apr 24 all on his own, and he’s a little nervous about it. But he seems pretty confident about who he thinks will win in the acting categories.
articles.content: They lied to me, saying they wanted to me to attend a meeting to discuss the second season of (variety show) Away With My BFF, he told CNA Lifestyle. I wore a T-shirt and shorts to that meeting. And … [+1062 chars]

articles.author: MICHAEL CHEANG
articles.title: Penang bar listed among 100 best bars in Asia for the first time ever - The Star Online
articles.description: Penang bar Backdoor Bodega has become the first bar from the state to be named in the 51-100 list by the Asia Best 50 Bars.
articles.content:
Penang bar Backdoor Bodega has become the first bar from the state to be named in the 51-100 list by the Asia Best 50 Bars.
